messages.title: THIS IS A CLIMATE ELECTION
messages.content: We are facing a climate emergency. To avert a human catastrophe, we must act now! The Greens will commit over £100 billion of investment in a low carbon future as part of the Green New Deal.

messages.title: THE CLIMATE IS BORDERLESS
messages.content: Tackling the climate crisis requires cooperation with our European and international partners to accelerate use of renewable sources of energy and protecting the planet's resources and environments.

messages.title: LOOK TO THE FUTURE - NOT THE PAST
messages.content: This election isn't about the next 5 years. It's about the next 50 years.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Co-operatively owned public utilities; a four-day working week for a better work-life balance; replacing business rates with fairer taxes; citizen assemblies.
Universal Basic Income; scrap tuition fees; free public childcare; fund the NHS and mental healthcare; tax wealth fairly and close loopholes.
Our position is clear. Britain’s future success depends on co-operation with our European partners.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: STANDING WITH YOU FOR A PEOPLE'S VOTE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: EU membership means we can shape and influence decisions to forge a better Europe. We will campaign for people to have the final say.
The Green Party will give small businesses a competitive break; a public banking system lending at fair rates to encourage growth and sustainable job creation.

mentions.candidate: John is a local candidate. John and his family have lived in Shenley for 25 years. He runs a management training business. A keen walker, John enjoys the local countryside and will work to protect Hertsmere’s green spaces and woodlands, essential for our well-being.

issues.brexitEurope: Our position is clear. Britain’s future success depends on co-operation with our European partners. EU membership means we can shape and influence decisions to forge a better Europe. We will campaign for people to have the final say.

images.caption: John Humphries - Your Green Party Candidate
